full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM KHRO RGYAL RTA MCHOG ROL PA BKA' SDOD CHOS SKYONG BEG TZE LCAM SRING RGYAL PO SKU LNGA DAM CAN RDOR LEGS KYI GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES YI DAM RTA MGRIN CHOS SKYONG GSUM GYIS GTOR MA SKYONG TSUL 'DOD DON MYUR 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG LDAN PA RNAM BYOR PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA DUS RGYUN DU YI DAM CHOS SKYONG LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG RGYAN LTAR AA MO GHA BADZRA GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
